Este fue un triunfo. 
Estoy haciendo una nota aquí: GRAN ÉXITO 
Es difícil exagerar mi satisfacción. 

Aperture Science: 
Hacemos lo que debemos, porque podemos
Por el bien de todos nosotros 
excepto por los que están muertos 

Pero no tiene sentido llorar por cada error 
Solo sigue intentándolo "hasta que te quedes sin tarta"
Y se haga la ciencia y hagas un arma genial
Para la gente que siga viva 

Ni siquiera estoy enojada 
Estoy siendo tan sincera en este momento 
A pesar de que me rompiste el corazón y me mataste 
Y me separaste en piezas 
Y tiraste cada pieza al fuego 
Mientras ardian dolía porque yo estaba tan feliz por ti! 
Ahora estos datos hacen una hermosa línea 
Y nos quedamos sin beta,lo hemos desarrollado(el juego, programa) a tiempo 
Así que soy feliz de quemarme
Piense en todas las cosas que hemos aprendido 
Para la gente que siga viva 

Ve delante y déjame 
Creo que prefiero quedarme dentro
Quizas encuentres a alguien que te ayude 
Quizás Black Mesa
Eso fue una broma, ja, ja, buen chiste
De todos modos este pastel es genial, es tan delicioso y jugoso 

Mírame aún hablando, cuando hay ciencia que hacer
Cuando miro ahi fuera me alegra no ser tú 
Tengo experimentos organizar, hay investigación que hacer 
En la gente que siga viva 

Y créeme todavía estoy viv@ 
Estoy haciendo ciencia y aún estoy viv@ 
Me siento fantástic@ y aún estoy viv@ 
Mientras te estés muriendo yo estaré aún viv@
Y cuando estés muerta yo seguiré estando aún viv@
AÚN VIV@
aún viv@ (/*_*)/

第一次写这个 感觉好紧张(●′ω`●)  说来和这游戏挺有缘的  这款游戏我是无意间听了那首STILL ALIVE知道的这个游戏  听了歌就觉得很有好感  目前打了1  准备打2  说说1给我的感觉吧   真的让我很难受很压抑很伤心！！！   游戏刚开始感觉是个轻松休闲的解谜闯关游戏  知道后面一些隐藏的小房间和她说说的话让我觉得并不简单  后来还让我不得不把自己的好朋友箱子先生（或者女士？ 因为她身上有粉色小桃心哦~） 扔进熔炉的时候很难过！   然后GLaDOS虽然老是欺骗主角  并且试图杀死主角  但是   当我打败她时  我却没有别的游戏那样打败了BOSS的快感  反而是更加的悲伤  那感觉仿佛是失去了一个非常好的朋友一般   一小段CG过后   一个仿佛仓库一般的场景  里面我的好朋友箱子先生回来了  在桌子上的是那个她曾经承诺给我的蛋糕   她真的为我准备了一个PARTY  而且我的朋友们也都来参加了 不管她以前怎么骗我  至少  这一次   她实现了她的诺言   最后游戏结束了  那首熟悉的STILL ALIVE在耳边响起  也让我又回忆起了她一步一步教我的时候....   总之游戏是个很棒的游戏 剧情方面也很不错 很值得入手 打的时候最好不要查攻略 不然就没有意思了 对了 记得一定要开字幕  开与不开的传送门是两个游戏  一定要记住开字幕！                2017.6.28

难得的好游戏，不得不承认有点烧脑！
大约两个半小时通关，
唯一的难点，掉入凹槽里的三个机器人解决了之后，
我以为用砖块和油桶搭积木跳上去，浪费了半个多小时。。。
（我脑洞也蛮大的，哈哈）
结果是在其中一个机器人房间里的爪子上的空间用传送通过！！！
看了高级模式中关卡还有传送次数和步数以及时间限制的挑战，简直不敢想！！！
气氛比较压抑，机器人配音好评！
第一次为游戏写评价，总之很好！

저는 포탈이라는 게임을 플레이 하면서 이걸 어떻게 풀어야할까 고민했습니다.
포탈건을 통한 2개의 포탈과 열린 포탈의 위치에 따른 중력가속도를 생각해야하는 3D 입체 퍼즐은 저에게 있어 신선한 재미를 선사했습니다.
스팀 여름 할인으로 90퍼 세일 가격 대비를 생각하면 나름 괜찮다고 생각합니다.

다만 게임이 생각을 많이해야되는 퍼즐 게임이다보니, 성격이 급하시거나 머리쓰는 복잡한 퍼즐 게임을 싫어하시는 분들이라면 게임의 재미를 느끼기 전에 인내심이 끊어질 우려가 있음으로 그런 분들께는 비추천 드립니다.

Amazing Game!! One.. actually two gripes I have with this game are that automatic save stops (literally) the game for few seconds and there are times (two or three times in the whole game) when the game freezes for few seconds. Overall, it was an unique experience and I finally get what "cake is a lie" means. :3 The levels gets harder each time and I quite enjoyed solving these mind-bending porblems. ps. I don't even know why I bought outlast when I find the end part of this game thrilling...

I don't really think anyone needs a Portal review in mid-2017, but nonetheless I will add my voice to the near-unanimous praise of this game.

I had never played this until quite recently, and it's definitely a game that has held up well. Time has been kind to this one. I think the biggest thing that makes Portal interesting is simply that it's a very well thought out game at every step, there's really no lazy sequences or rooms that had no thought put into them. As a game that really innovated essentially a new style of puzzle game, it was always going to score high for infleunce, but should also score high simply on it's own merits as a fun and entertaining game that can actually make you think. The puzzles are good, the environment is interesting, and the narration/story has a really interesting dark sense of humor.

It's not a lengthy game, I beat it in just over 5 hours myself, but it's an extremely well crafted one. I'm really not sure how one could be into video games and not find something to like about Portal.

其实一开始让我给这个游戏写评测我是拒绝的，因为这个游戏我根本不会玩，被十九个关卡（更像是二十多个）虐了死去活来之后，然后还告诉我还有高级关卡，然后我又控制不住打开了高级模式，然后我一直在被这些关卡单刷，这些关卡像幻想乡的小姐姐一样让我上天的同时又想死，被日了三个小时之后我找出了大把野路子。总而言之，老子不会再玩挑战模式了！

PS*：17号实验室的三个台阶不需要开启，叠摄像头就行了，然后再放上同伴方块踩上去（在高级模式被逼疯想出来的）

暑期特惠的时候买了portal 1和2，先玩的1，直接被惊艳了，整个游戏玩下来都在惊呼“还有这种操作！！！！“，更深刻的体会到”只有想不到，没有做不到”这句话。

游戏前90%都是那种充满科技感和实验室感觉的屋子，但是最后不知道为什么，感觉有点压抑。但这并不能阻止我爱上这款游戏~

总之，强推！

My first experience with portal was back in 2009, with the Orange Box for the Xbox 360 (regrettably). Coming back to play it now, it still retains all of it's original charm, humour and challenge, and has aged remarkably well (much like all valve games). This was and still is an unexpected masterpiece of gaming, even if it is on the short side (completed in 1.4 hours on this replay, of course the length doesn't matter, as Portal gets all it needs into every second of gameplay). Still, if you haven't yet played Portal, it is an absolute must-have game for anybody looking for a refreshing twist on the first-person puzzle adventure genre.

[u] [b] Positives: [/b] [/u]
+	Nice art direction! The puzzle rooms have a simple clean look but are still interesting to view. Areas outside the puzzle rooms have an appropriately creepy, abandoned vibe.
+	GLaDOS has a really fun personality and some of my favorite gaming quotes! “Did you know you can donate one or all of your vital organs to the Aperture Science Self-Esteem Fund for Girls? It's true!” as just a random example :)
+	The game’s voicework, sound effects and music are all fitting and memorable. The talking turrets especially, you’ll really just have to listen to them yourself!

[u] [b] Negatives: [/b] [/u]
-	Nearly all the puzzles are clever and fun to solve, but a few might give newcomers a hard time.

[u] [b] Overall: [/b] [/u]

Beyin bedava

This the first Valve game I've ever played and I must say, I'm impressed.

I like this game a lot. It's a great game of people who like problem-solving and strategy games. Even if you aren't very good at it (but still like it), you'll be able to finish the game, it's not too complex.

Another thing is performance, I don't know how they did it, but Valve did a really good job at this. You can smoothly run this on your 5 year old school laptop while the graphics are still good (I tested it, 2nd generation i5 processor and a intel HD graphics 3000). 0 lag.

For those who can't get enough of it... Yup, there's Portal 2, which has the same concept, but has even better graphics #hype.

The only downside I can think of is that it's a bit short, I finished it in +/- 4 hours (the story (which is great), not the extra maps which you can play as well). Portal 2 is longer and adds more things to the game, not telling you what!

A deserved 10/10 and upvote!

Portal came into my life at a crucial stage in my maturation as a person and carved unforgettable memories of its atmosphere, writing, challenges, puzzle designs, and MOMENTS into my being.

Portal is a successful piece of art, in that it gave me new perspective on life and on the beauty of fiction like it. A great poem, or some splendid imagery, or a sublime stageplay can change a person and permanently become a part of them as one of their experiences. That is what Portal is to me.
